Source.SelectQuery: select f.* from blocklist_requests_by_day f, v_products d where f.product_id = d.product_id and d.product_name = 'Thunderbird';
Source.QueryOnSource: SELECT utc_date_id as value FROM blocklist_requests_by_day group by utc_date_id;
Source.IncrementSelectQuery: select f.* from blocklist_requests_by_day f, v_products d where f.product_id = d.product_id and d.product_name = 'Thunderbird' and utc_date_id in (${INCREMENT_LIST});

Target.QueryOnTarget: SELECT utc_date_id as value FROM blocklist_requests_by_day_th group by utc_date_id;
